products.name: Nikkie Jumpsuit
products.brandedName: Pistola Denim Nikkie Jumpsuit
products.description: Nikkie Jumpsuit Nikkie Jumpsuit 100% cotton. Made in China. Machine wash. Zip fly with button closure. 7-pocket design. Blouson sleeves with button cuffs. Midweight denim fabric. PSTL-WC77. P00071090DB PNKGT. PISTOLA is a premium denim label offering contemporary ready-to-wear collections designed with the modern woman's independent spirit in mind. Founded in 2013 by industry veteran Grace Na, Pistola skillfully blends expert cuts with a streetwise sensibility. Designed in California, PISTOLA garment is meticulously crafted, elevating everyday material with precise fits and utilitarian style edge, to give women thoughtfully designed classics as wardrobe essentials to live in. PISTOLA stands by the guiding principle that high-quality denim is for everyone, forever.

products.name: SIMKHAI Abby Long Sleeve Ruched Mini Dress in Rust

products.description: SIMKHAI Abby Long Sleeve Ruched Mini Dress in Rust Self: 96% rayon 4% spandex Lining: 94% rayon 6% spandex. Made in China. Dry clean only. Fully lined. Back keyhole cut-out with button loop closure. Ruched jersey fabric with surplice hem. JSIM-WD564. 124-1073-Y. About the designer: New York born and raised designer, Jonathan Simkhai started his fashion fascination at the early age of 14 where he built his buying skills working at a local retail clothing store. He took his love for the industry and went on to attend Parsons and FIT. His self titled women's collection debuted in 2010 showcasing the cross between genders. Jonathan's design aesthetic is menswear-inspired pieces incorporated into feminine silhouettes that remain classic and sophisticated for the modern, cosmopolitan woman.

products.brandedName: On Women's Cloudnova Form (Aster/Magnet) Women's Shoes
products.description: The On Cloudnova Form sneaker is perfect to wear anywhere and for anything. CloudTec outsole technology delivers soft landings. Round toe silhouette. Perforated microfiber tongue and breathable upper. Rubber reinforcements to mirror the natural rolling motion. Lace-up closure. Imported. products.name: Classic Slip-On Shoe(90s Grunge Black)
products.brandedName: Vans Classic Slip-On Shoe(90s Grunge Black)
products.description: The Slip-On that's been Setting Trends Since 1979The Classic Slip-On, with its "No Laces, No Problems" approach, was first introduced to the world in 1979. Since then, it's become a pop culture icon, known for its ability to dress up or down, its reliable comfort, and the flexibility to adapt to everyone's style. With an allover leopard print popping against solid black sidewalls and trim, this Classic Slip-On recalls the era of grunge and pays homage to the 90s. Iconic Slip-On shoe Low profile textile uppers Allover leopard print Supportive padded collars Elastic side accents Signature rubber waffle outsoles

products.name: Olivia von Halle - Yves Crushed-velvet Pajamas - Green
products.brandedName: Olivia von Halle Yves Crushed-velvet Pajamas - Green
products.description: Olivia von Halle looks to the vintage glamour of the '30s for these 'Yves' pajamas. They're cut from jewel-toned velvet that's woven with touches of silk and has a beautiful, crushed texture. They may technically be for sleeping but will work with heels at dinner parties, too.
